website_summaries.verdict: This 10-pack of ponchos comes with 5 large and 5 small — ideal for families with kids.
pros: Colors make it easy to spot your family in the rain
Works great to keep you dry on water rides at theme parks
cons: Once open, you won't be able to get this poncho back into its original packaging — so bring another bag to store it in if you want to use again

customer_reviews.title: Great, packable, light, reusable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my family of 5 ahead of a trip to Orlando theme parks. Didn’t want to get stuck paying amusement parks prices in a downpour. They come individually packaged and labeled, I liked the different colors so each family member could remember (and reuse!) theirs. Of course could not get back in original packaging, but used ziplock sandwich bag. These were a total win!
customer_reviews.author: Btwinmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: We used these ponchos on our recent trip to Disney and they were awesome!!! The sizing was great for my kids too (age 10 and 3)... the one negative thing I would say would be that the child size ponchos did not have drawstrings in the hood like the adults- my ten year old was bothered by this because he wanted to make his hood tighter. But otherwise GREAT product! Would def buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our family of 4’s trip to Disney. And we needed them!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyLady

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for our Disney trip. Definitely came in handy when it rained! Great small & flat packaging so it's easy to store in your bag at the park or anywhere really. I loved having both adult & child sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Best Ponchos By Far!
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I was pleasantly surprised when I received this box of ponchos. Not only was it packaged as a rainbow of colors (how fitting!) but they are also more durable than others I’ve used. A great product at an excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: Morgansway

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Quality service.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived quickly, and exactly as expected. Loved the carry pouches. These ponchos aren't so thin that you can tear them easily, but not so thick that you get hot. Just what we needed. Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Better than carrying a cumbersome umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: We went to Chicago and took our ponchos. We had an extreme boat ride and although my girls wanted to get wet, I didn’t. Ultimately we all donned ponchos for the boat ride. It rained one day while we were there so we used them that day as well. Good material. They didn’t rip. Reasonably priced so I didn’t feel bad throwing them away. They’re individually packed and labeled “adult” and “child”. Super compact so they easily fit in my purse. They were a lot less cumbersome than an umbrella especially if it’s windy! The adult had a drawstring for the hood part!
customer_reviews.author: Delia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.text: We packed these on a recent trip to San Francisco. We wore them several times while on boat rides. They were sturdier than we expected and were easy to repack into their little bags. They fit very well too. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie Buresh

customer_reviews.title: I love these ponchos
customer_reviews.text: I love these ponchos, they came right on time to our Disney trip, the colors were great and I was able to color code the kids matching us, it was easy to find them. Also the size was perfect for the kids ! , The drawstrings was easy to use and I love the packaging, keeps the ponchos organized in my car and each little poncho is labeled by the size. I will definetely keep buying from them !
customer_reviews.author: Damaris RH

customer_reviews.title: Good to have in case you need it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for family trip to Disney world in case it rains. Great for a family of four. Light weight. Packaged well so we could tuck it in our travel backpacks. We didn’t go on water rides but I think this would be handy to have as well. Never actually used it but wanted to be prepared and have it just in case because they are hard to find and expensive at theme parks.
customer_reviews.author: Kitely

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely compact and are sturdy enough to suit your purposes
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely compact and are sturdy enough to suit your purposes. The different colors make it easy to distinguish whose is whose in your party as well, for instance which ones are for the adults and which are children's. The hood drawstring could be a strangulation risk, but you have the option not to tie the hood on very small children and meanwhile the fancy-haired grandmas will appreciate the ability to fully protect The 'Do.
customer_reviews.author: Flibberty Gibbet

customer_reviews.title: wonderful set of rain ponchos for those rainy parades
customer_reviews.text: Loved this family pack of ponchos, we needed them for kids and adults in a parade(it usually rains for this parade) It would have kept 10 people dry during the parade. However, it didnt rain this year, so we didnt get to use them, but we are ready for the next parade. Great buy and great price. I would recommend this product and seller .
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ontko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ponchos!
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos were perfect for my family during our trip to Disney World. Great quality, easy to pack in a purse or backpack and much more affordable than the $15 ponchos Disney sells in the parks.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna

customer_reviews.title: The individual packages make it easy to grab and go
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd box we have purchased. 1st box was originally for a family trip to Disney, they were perfect. We have used the rest walking Bourbon Street in New Orleans and hiking trails in Kentucky. Really like the individual packs, the ease of taking them along. On our last trip we got caught in the rain and only had 1 adult and 1 child left. The child fit a 5ft 4 in woman just fine to enjoy the rest of the rainy day. Came home and reordered a new box.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the water rides at Universal Studios Orlando—worked great!
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight, which makes them easy to carry around in a small bag, but they are not really for multiple days of wear. We used them at Universal Studios Orlando on the water rides and they were great. We tossed them when we were done with the rides. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: pegs3

customer_reviews.title: Theme park must!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a trip to Disney. I like how they came individually wrapped and labeled adult or child. This is a must for theme parks, games or any other outdoor activities. Great for purse or leave a few in the cqr
customer_reviews.author: S Fond

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-Pack and Great Looking
customer_reviews.text: We loved the ponchos, and think they'll be perfect for our Disney trip. They're a little thicker than the dollar store ones, and also very colorful. We personally didn't want reusable ones, as we don't want to haul around wet ponchos. They are individually packaged, so they slip easily into a backpack or even a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: There were only two adult ponchos in the set we received. This was an issue since I needed enough for five adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water rides at Disneyland
customer_reviews.text: We brought these to Disneyland to keep us from getting soak on the water rides. They did their job perfectly. I think the other people in our river raft were envious. They left the ride soaked and we were hardly wet. It wasn't super hot when we were there, so I wasn't too excited about getting wet and then cold and uncomfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela62

customer_reviews.title: Strong material, life saver
customer_reviews.text: We always keep a box of ponchos in the house since we frequently go to concerts and always seem to get rained on. The colors are beautiful and the material has yet to rip! through the running and rushing that they are put through, these always stand strong!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the description better 6 kid size and 4 adult luckily the kid ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better 6 kid size and 4 adult luckily the kid sizes wide just not very long should still do well enough in smaller adults. revised review though the error was all mine the company offered a complete refund. even after i told them it wasn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for hard rain.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Orlando and the rain here is so hard you need the good ponchos. These we're cheap, but also cheap made. Next time I will spend a little more to get better thicker plastic than these super thin ones.
customer_reviews.author: M. Haas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach biking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ponchos for my granddaughter and her husband who operate a rental bike business in Santa Monica on the beach. They told me that their customers are delighted that they are offered your ponchos - especially in different sizes - when the clouds are threatening rain. The price is reasonable and I'm sure they will be ordering more from you. Thank you for a helpful product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Hoult

customer_reviews.title: It was hot out so it got super hot under the ponchos which is to be expected
customer_reviews.text: Ponchos worked well on our last Disney trip where it rained everyday. We reused them all week. It was hot out so it got super hot under the ponchos which is to be expected. Also it was windy so the hoods would slide back on our heads, if you tied them right they’d sit right on your eyes. But overall we were happy with them, liked the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We just received these so I can’t comment on them quite yet but I was pleased with the quality and amount of ponchos you got in a small box. We will be bringing these to Disney with us!
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: These were great to have when we went to Disneyland knowing that we were going on a water ride. It kept us dry while everyone else got soaking wet. I like that this has the kids and adults sizes. They're easy to throw into your purse.
customer_reviews.author: laazykat

customer_reviews.title: Adult and child ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. These are quality individually packed ponchos for adults and children. We purchased these to take to a concert in a stadium in case of rain but didn’t need to use them. My daughter tried on a child poncho and it fit properly and looked like it would do the job.
customer_reviews.author: H. VanWormer

customer_reviews.title: We needed these next day and delivery was great on this
customer_reviews.text: We needed these next day and delivery was great on this. The ponchos were disposable but we were able to use them a few times. I would buy these again. Variety packed worked well for my family.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQT

customer_reviews.title: Great Ponchos for a family trip
customer_reviews.text: 5 days at Universal Studios when the weather was predicted to be rain all week and they definitely came in handy. They lasted a full week in and out of our backpack and survived a torrential downpour.
customer_reviews.author: Martin E. Brownell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Disney vacation this summer. For the occasional downpour and water rides. Very compact so easy to store in fanny packs or backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Mom from Boston

customer_reviews.title: better for summer when your not wearing long selves
customer_reviews.text: They kept my 8 year old and I's body dry in a rain storm during our camping trip. Arms were soaked tho and Mine tore a bit when I took it off so I can't say they work for multi wears but as a disposable rain ponchos they work well. better for summer when your not wearing long selves.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie R.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We used these in Disneyland and they were perfect to carry in pack until needed. Great value for the money & we were glad we had them. Fun colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: cindy82421

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and portable
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for an outing or to put in my kid’s backpack just in case. I am going to keep one in my purse too.
customer_reviews.author: Krissykins

customer_reviews.title: Prepared us for the weather!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a Disney trip, family of 4. Came in handy during those afternoon thunderstorms. They packed easily in our park bag and fit us well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for Disney. Luckily we didn’t need them too often, but held up well. Fit plus size adults, covered stroller and electric cart.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda A.

customer_reviews.title: ... a spin on Kali River Rapids and were in good enough shape to pass on to people waiting in ...
customer_reviews.text: Used them at Disney- survived a spin on Kali River Rapids and were in good enough shape to pass on to people waiting in line. My dad was especially impressed with the drawstring on the adult ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Summer showers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a zoo field trip in the pouring rain. They did the trick and the cute colors are an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The material is good
customer_reviews.text: The material of the raincoat is good , but the sleeves are a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Susan 255

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have not used these and will be grateful if I do not have to. Purchased for an upcoming family trip to Disney. I opened one child and one adult. They seem well made. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia B. Flike

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Essentials to go to Disney and easy to carry, like it !
customer_reviews.author: long wen

customer_reviews.title: Travel and car essential
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Great rain protection. easily fits in purse. Keep one in car and suitcase too
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Champlin

customer_reviews.title: Super compact and perfect to keep in the car or ...
customer_reviews.text: Took these ponchos to Disney World on a family vacation and they most definitely came in handy! Super compact and perfect to keep in the car or in a backpack in case of emergencies. One for each person of the family, including the toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Used them at Disney land and they were great. The ones they have there are way overpriced so this was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Elias

customer_reviews.title: Luckily we haven't had to use them yet (purchased for family vacation) but they look like they would hold up well
customer_reviews.text: These rain ponchos were exactly what I was looking for. They are heavier than the inexpensive ones I have seen in the stores. Luckily we haven't had to use them yet (purchased for family vacation) but they look like they would hold up well. And they are packaged so they easily fit in a purse or bag.
customer_reviews.author: OneReader

customer_reviews.title: Small packs with big help!
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us at our son’s graduation! Just what we needed to protect us from the off & on rain!
customer_reviews.author: Lee T.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a just in case event. I initially ordered these before trick or treat and then the weather cleared up. But, we now have them in our cars in case we get stuck in a storm somewhere. Great concept and the individual packages are nice. Also having the wide variety of colors is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Disney
customer_reviews.text: We used these for Disney. Perfect, small and portable. Child size was big enough for 2 adults in our party, though a bit short. Can't beat the price. Will keep the extras for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Great size selection for a family!
customer_reviews.text: I've not had a chance to open the package yet, as we are taking it to Disney in a month. I didn't want to open them until we get there. But it came to me very quickly, and I'm excited about the selection of sizes and colors. There are 4 adults, and 4 children traveling in our group, so this one box of ponchos should cover us all.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Gladney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and reasonably priced. Kids versions did not come with a drawstring to tighten the hood, but the adult versions did. Both kept slipping off but all in all better than other ones I’ve tried. Length fell at about knee level for me (5’4”).
customer_reviews.author: Ssem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for amusement parks
customer_reviews.text: Great for amusement parks! My husband thought I was silly for getting these, but sang a different tune after getting caught in a rain storm
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t rate the ponchos yet!!! That’s really a good thing too! Bought them to bring on an Alaskan cruise and we haven’t needed to use them !!!! Yeah, it’s been great weather! I can say we got them quickly and the colors are great !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy of 4

customer_reviews.title: Great for a trip to Disney World
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is I wish the child size also had the draw string around the face.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, love the small packaging
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Used at Disney during hurricane season. Loved how compact the packaging is...I easily fit two adult ponchos into a small crossbody bag along with all my other items. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and quality. This product will help you stay dry through those rainy spring and summer days. I am happy with my purchase and would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: bc25

customer_reviews.title: Ponchos
customer_reviews.text: We used this ponchos for our trip to Disney world and they were very useful. We are a family of 4 and they were very useful because it does rain.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Disney
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a Disney trip as you never know when it may rain. The price was perfect and we did end up needing one day. And grateful we had these
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Great for just-in-case travel needs
customer_reviews.text: Compact, functional and reusable. Perfect for the backpack at Disney.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Great for our trip to disney. Used these once. My only complaint was that the hood wouldn't stay on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Leiby

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos are of a goog quality and I like how they color coordinate them which is very helpful at an amusement park. That way the adults can easily spot their children.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great ponchos for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for helping to make our Disney World vacation a success! Rain didn't keep us down, and your ponchos kept us dry. My daughter, who is 5'6", was able to wear a child size, though. She didn't want her poncho to be as long on her legs. Great colors, too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan McLean

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: These are great inexpensive emergency ponchos. They are light and compact to easily carry around in case of rain. I recommend putting a knot on the adult poncho hood string so they don’t pull out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Kept us dry
customer_reviews.text: The ponchos served their purpose for us while we were in Disney World. I was hoping that the child size would’ve worked for our shortest adults, but they were a little small.
customer_reviews.author: AdamandChelle

customer_reviews.title: Cute Colors
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Disney. Didn’t use them but kept because they are a good value and handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Astew

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect! Delivery was as expected
customer_reviews.text: We brought these to Orlando to use on water rides when we did not want to be soaked all day. They were perfect! Delivery was as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: We ended up using them 3 days in a row and they held up beautifully for us
customer_reviews.text: The forecast called for rain nearly every day of our family vacation to Chicago so I ordered these ahead of time to take along. We ended up using them 3 days in a row and they held up beautifully for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy transaction and product seems to be as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these ponchos for an upcoming Disney trip. Box cam with 10 ponchos, 5 adult and 5 youth size, in 5 colors, one adult and one youth each. Haven’t opened them yet. Hoping they will be durable enough to reuse during our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were great when it started to rain while we were at ...
customer_reviews.text: These were great when it started to rain while we were at Universal Studios this last weekend. People kept stopping us and asking where we got them. We were glad to say "Amazon!"
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mingle

customer_reviews.title: worked good for our trip to Disney where you pay $10 ...
customer_reviews.text: worked good for our trip to Disney where you pay $10 for a rain poncho
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than the dollar store
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than the dollar store, but cheaper than reusable ponchos
customer_reviews.author: SDudzik

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Handy, and so glad to have for Disney trip. Like adult and child sizes.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Individually packed and easy for purse or car glove box
customer_reviews.text: Thin but practical for emergency use. Individually packed and easy for purse or car glove box!
customer_reviews.author: kelly mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect I only opened one for a child to make ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect I only opened one for a child to make sure it wasn’t too big or too small. The material is good quality I’m looking forward to using these when we go on our vacation.
customer_reviews.author: mtzb98

customer_reviews.title: Great Ponchos, Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: These ponchos were purchased for a family trip to Disney World. I am thrilled with the quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: A. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: For the price they kept us dry but they are cheap so don’t expect to wear them more than once
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Durable to use more than once and size is very easy to keep with you. We bought for Girl Scout events with predicated rainfall and they have come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Koogler

customer_reviews.title: String in hood fab
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize there were 5 adult 5 kids. I thought all were adult. Very durable. I dried and refilded easly. Love the string in the hood. Fabulous
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: They worked out perfectly.. took them with us to Disneyland ...they worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Welch

customer_reviews.title: Box said 5 adult 5 child. It brought 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Box said 5 adult 5 child. It brought 3 adults 7 childs. I ordered two boxes and both were the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlynn

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used yet.
customer_reviews.text: They appear as described, but I’ve not needed them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Covid19 protection
customer_reviews.text: will work perfectly for our intended need . to wear over my clothes on an air line flight to protect me and my clothing from Covid19 droplets
customer_reviews.author: Donna  A  De Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Will work great!
customer_reviews.text: These will work perfectly when my family goes to Walt Disney World later on this year. It has the big sizes and small sizes for everyone in my family. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ashley martin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Taking them on a trip so we haven’t used them yet. They appear heavier
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Rain poncho, what can I say?
customer_reviews.text: These came in very handy for a Girl Scout camping trip. They do what they say and they’re easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Polly M.

customer_reviews.title: Family pack was a great variety! Good quality too
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for Disney! Family pack was a great variety! Good quality too!
customer_reviews.author: jillian thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t travel without this!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the family pack of ponchos, exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: Betty B. Lazarus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and great value! We used at Disney World. The kids liked the multi colors
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for theme parks!
customer_reviews.text: These were light and small to throw into our backpacks for a theme park in Florida. We used them everyday for the pop up showers. Loved the drawstring hood on the adult ponchos!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Came in handy for our recent trip to Disney. Not as thick as reusable ponchos, but nice to be able to throw away after use and then pack a fresh one for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Used for Disney
customer_reviews.text: These were great for our Disney trip. They stick to you though and that is kind of annoying but they fulfilled their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Good to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: We took these ponchos on a trip and I am so glad we did! These were great to have on hand and worked exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product... now prepared in our cars when rain comes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Payne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: 5 adult and 5 kid ponchos which worked out perfectly for my family attending a Taylor Swift concert in the pouring rain! They were great!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Item says 5 Adult & 5 Child size. The box we received there were 7 child size and 3 Adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gentile

customer_reviews.title: practical, thoughtful gift
customer_reviews.text: Great inexpensive thoughtful gift for families. Bought these at Christmas for neighbors, now back for another set to leave with friends I'll be staying with soon. A true no brained for young families!
customer_reviews.author: Melba Ramos

customer_reviews.title: They packed well and did a great job keeping everyone dry
customer_reviews.text: Used these at Disney. They packed well and did a great job keeping everyone dry.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for, for our Disney trip
customer_reviews.author: bonnie miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our trip!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the rain ponchos for our trip to Disney World. Great for the frequent rain Florida gets. Loved the variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Valdes Dapena

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Ponchos
customer_reviews.text: Will buy these again for our next trip to Disney World. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Poncho!
customer_reviews.text: We love our ponchos and the poncho for our five year old daughter fits her perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kip H.

customer_reviews.title: We have not yet used them, but they seem ...
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet used them, but they seem to be just what we wanted. Will be taking them on vacation shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilynn Hinrichs

product_meta.title: Clear Harbour Emergency Disposable Poncho Family Pack | Thick Reusable .03mm PE Plastic Rain Ponchos for Women, Men, and Children | Rain Poncho Family Pack for Theme Parks
feature_bullets: SAVE WITH BUNDLE: Avoid paying for expensive on-site emergency ponchos when it starts to rain!
THICKER THAN MOST BRANDS: Tear-resistant material allows for multiple uses.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMPACT: Ideal for theme parks, camping, festivals,, and to store in your purse or car.
DRAWSTRING HOOD: Adult poncho includes drawstring hood for added neck and head protection.
ASSORTED COLORS FOR CONVENIENCE: Bundle contains 5 contemporary colors (clear, green, red, purple, blue)
